Row.Text: Be the first to discover a [B]Natural Wonder[/B]
[B]Discovery[/B] was an important part of [B]Iceland's[/B] identity.

At the edge of the world, the earth gives way to a sight more beautiful than anything seen before. What other marvels await in the uncharted lands? {1_Civilization_Adj} explorers unite to witness these secrets, seeking a new path guided by adventure and the wider world.
[B]Raiding[/B] was an important part of [B]Iceland's[/B] identity.

Gold-laden ships ride low in the water as raiders return to {1_Civilization_Adj} shores. Their marvelous spoils make valued gifts that unite families into clans, and clans into…something more. As the stakes of these exchanges rise, and the demand for riches grows, the raiders ready their ships once more.
